text:
Květa Fialová (1 September 1929 – 26 September 2017) was a Czech actress. She was best known for her performance in "Lemonade Joe". She was born in Veľké Dravce, Czechoslovakia. She also appeared in "Dinner for Adele" (1977) and "I Enjoy the World With You" (1982).
Fialová died in Prague, Czech Republic on 26 September 2017 at the age of 88.

annotations.surface_form: I Enjoy the World With You
